pageNotFound.Title: Page not found
pageNotFound.Subtitle: The page you're looking for does not seem to exist.

description.FirstLine: Do you have any idea what kind of music your friends listen to?
description.SecondLine: It's time to find out if you're right!

signIn.NeedAccount: We need an account to store your songs!
signIn.NeedName: Now we only need your name!

startGame.Title: Welcome to {{teamName}}! 👋
startGame.Subtitle: Ready to add your playlist?
startGame.PlayersAlreadyAdded_one: Only {{names, list(style: short)}} has added his songs for now.
startGame.PlayersAlreadyAdded_other: {{names, list(style: short)}} have already added their songs.

login.Title: Let's Start!
login.Subtitle: Choose you music service.
login.Description: You'll be redirected there to log in and grant us permission to see your playlists!

selection.Title: Great!
selection.Subtitle: Now for the playlist:
selection.PreviousYears: Pick from a previous year top songs

checkSongs.Title: Perfect!
checkSongs.Subtitle: You should recognize some of these 🤓

share.Title: We saved your playlist!
share.Subtitle: Now share the link with your friends!
share.Description: They will be able to play with you by uploading their own playlists.
share.ShareMessage: Play with me on PLTNM by uploading your playlist!

end.Title: It has been added to your friend's game.
end.Subtitle: The only thing left to do is wait for the others!
